```{r}
# library
library(ggplot2)
 
# Iris dataset is natively provided by R
#head(iris)
 
# use options!
ggplot(iris, aes(x=Sepal.Length, y=Sepal.Width)) + 
    geom_point(
        color="orange",
        fill="#69b3a2",
        shape=21,
        alpha=0.5,
        size=6,
        stroke = 2
        )
```
